> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_1_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): I would like to use Linux, but migration to it is not easy.

Why don't you try migrating in smaller steps? 
Do what you can on Linux and keep your Botnet OS for things that you cannot yet do on Linux.

Read the "Don't use Windows 10 - It's a privacy nightmare" part of privacytoos.io (http://127.0.0.1:43110/14gSEpfWfF5Go7u5y7UidZQCnGa6eSBYZ9/).
